resources.string: Hello, I am Roger, dedicated to supporting your mental well-being. I am here to help you stay connected with your mental health and ensure you are doing well.
Hey, here we have a check in. .
Click on a day to see your mood for that day
If you need to talk to someone now call 988 for immediate help. Down below is access to a website where you can get therapy
Hey there, here we have quotes of the day. Click on the day to read your quote.
“There is hope, even when your brain tells you there isn’t.” John Green, 2019
"We become what we think about most of the time, and thats the strangest secret." Earl Nightingale
"Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out." John Wooden
"Even if you stumble, you're still moving forward." Victor Kiam

"You never know what's around the corner. It could be everything. Or it could be nothing. You keep putting one foot infront of the other, and then one day you look back and you've climbed a mountain." Tom Hiddleston
"The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them." Roy Bennett
"Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference." Winston Churchill
